data.title: Jerry Pournelle – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Jerry Pournelle. Browse Jerry Pournelle’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
The Mote in God's Eye

By: Larry Niven, Jerry Pournelle

Narrated by: L J Ganser

Length: 20 hrs and 28 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4 out of 5 stars 7,896

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 5,932

Story

4 out of 5 stars 5,969

An epic novel of mankind's first encounter with alien life that transcends the genre. No lesser an authority than Robert A. Heinlein called it "possibly the finest science fiction novel I have ever read"....

4 out of 5 stars

A great read!

By J. Rhoderick on 02-12-10
